name: Dying to Live
description:
A long time ago your witch lover cursed you so that when you die you get resurrected at where you last slept. But there is a catch if you intentionally die enough. Then the curse will break and you will die forever. But you never loved the witch and want to escape it forever. So you ventured to the forest to eat mushrooms that will kill you. The witch found out and is coming with you to try and stop you. That is where you are now.

WASD or Arrow keys to move.

Figure out what mushrooms heal you and what ones hurt you.
